title: T206 Sale +++ 65 (raw and graded) Best Offers
author: mybuddyinc

posts.post_title: T206 Sale +++ 65 (raw and graded) Best Offers
posts.post_content:
I have 65 T206 cards (raw and graded) lost in the black hole of ebay BIN's.

[url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/sg713/m.html?item=371153290372&hash=item566a75c484&pt=US_Baseball&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2562[/url]


They have high :o BIN prices, and high :o auto-accept prices..........

............ Of course, selling via BST can save me a few bucks, that I can pass onto potential buyers................

............... So, if interested, contact me with your "net54 Best Offer" and we can see if we can work something out.

________________________________

Free s/h.  Any form of payment accepted.  

Although PMs will be read and responded to, I very much prefer email at: [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

You can also email me for better scans, questions, comments, suggestions, etc.

A few things, so I can keep this as organized as possible:

1 -- I will address all correspondences in the order of date/time delivery into my email box (including PMs).
2 -- Please Note:  I work evenings/nights, and keep somewhat odd hours. Therefore response time may vary depending when I am on the computer. However, all correspondences will be addressed.
3 -- “I’ll take it” will take president over ongoing correspondences.
4 –- Satisfaction guaranteed.

Thanks, Scott

Scott,
I received the card exactly as described! 
Thanks again,
Michael
